channel.title: Ideas
channel.description:
I need ideas on little features to add to RSCEmulation. For example, I've recently been working on this DM feature:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Iru5Bw3ND5U
It doesn't really affect the overall game play but it's there for those who want to do it. Can anyone else think of something like that which can be added? Something new, unique and generally just fun?

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @Intoxication Intoxication
item.description:
@Intoxication wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:5, topic:388589”][quote author=BrenP10 link=topic=484407.msg3550562#msg3550562 date=1301487432]
Strange the landscape of the dm arena is same as aftermath and suddenly could code this ?

Good job aftermath for making this great feature for kryptdick
[/quote]
I didn’t think you’d have a response to that.[/quote]

His profile: Last Active: March 30, 2011, 07:23:23 AM

Time of post: « Reply #13 on: March 30, 2011, 07:17:12 AM »

Did you really try and get cocky there? Tone it down a bit…

Read full topic

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

how about balancing all weapon types? example making longsword,maces, dagger usable in some
cases instead of everyone just using a r2h.

Read full topic

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:9, topic:388585”]and someone then choose to thumb up or thumb down the almost dead gladiator.

Then the winner, will scream “ARE YOU NOT ENTERTAINED, ARE YOU NOT ENTERTAINED, IS THIS NOT WHY YOU ARE HERE!!”[/quote]

We should totally make this for kicks.

Read full topic

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

The_AFKer:

Allow people to watch the actual event by some type of ghosting function.

Create like a gladiator arena where players can go eat bread and wine while watching the fight.

Read full topic

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

Allow players to pick from multiple locations rather than just one arena, and/or

Allow people to watch the actual event by some type of ghosting function.

Read full topic

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:3, topic:388589”][quote author=object link=topic=484407.msg3549550#msg3549550 date=1301424432]
If you do not have the option for someone to bet on a winner of a duel or a death match, perhaps that could be a fun feature to add?
[/quote]
I’d love to do something like that but you could fake the results by fighting a friend or whatever. :([/quote]
Of course the bets will be made before the match begins.

Read full topic
